CS101.name: Computer Skills II
CS101.description: Development of essential computer skills including spreadsheets and databases.

CS102.name: Introduction to Computing
CS102.description: Basic principles of computer systems and programming logic.

CS201.name: Data Structures & Algorithms
CS201.description: Covers arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and sorting/searching algorithms.

CS202.name: Database Systems
CS202.description: Relational databases, SQL, and database design concepts.

CS301.name: Operating Systems
CS301.description: Processes, threads, memory management, and file systems.

CS302.name: Computer Networks
CS302.description: TCP/IP model, routing, switching, and network protocols.

CS401.name: Software Engineering
CS401.description: Software development lifecycle, design patterns, and project management.

CS402.name: Artificial Intelligence
CS402.description: Introduction to AI techniques including search, logic, and machine learning foundations.
